function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global response to Covid-19 causing strain on resources and infrastructure","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases due to stretched resources","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure and resources, implementation of strict public health measures","Technologies":"Telemedicine, contact tracing apps, remote monitoring technologies","People":"General public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, international health agencies"},{"Description":"Changing social and political practices affecting sustainable transitions","Impact":"Inequalities in sustainable transitions leading to higher risk for certain social groups","Mitigation":"Adjusting policies to account for inequalities, providing support for affected social groups","Technologies":"Data analysis for identifying inequalities, social support platforms","People":"Those employed in fossil fuel industries, communities at high risk from climate change","Owner":"Government, organizations focusing on sustainable transitions"},{"Description":"Public support for action on climate change at all-time high prior to Covid-19","Impact":"Potential decrease in momentum for climate change action due to focus on Covid-19 response","Mitigation":"Continued public awareness campaigns, integration of climate action into Covid-19 response measures","Technologies":"Public education platforms, social media campaigns","People":"General public, environmental activists, policymakers","Owner":"Environmental organizations, government, public health agencies"}]}
